long_description: A natural for camp, cabin or a spare bed at home! This wide cot is perfect for folks who prefer a little extra space. Tough, 1000-denier polyester mesh provides breathable comfort for a good night's sleep. Fabric tension is easily adjusted with a twist of the wing nut. Strong tubular aluminum alloy frame has the strength of steel at one-third the weight. Convenient carry bag attaches to cot frame to double as a night storage pouch.
short_description: A natural for camp, cabin or a spare bed at home! This wide cot is perfect for folks who prefer a little extra space.
